mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts ( id, address, appellation, contactSummary, createBy, createTime, description, nextContactTime, email, source, owner, mphone, job, fullname, customerId, birth )values ( #{id}, #{address}, #{appellation}, #{contactSummary}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{nextContactTime}, #{email}, #{source}, #{owner}, #{mphone}, #{job}, #{fullname}, #{customerId}, #{birth} )
